mapper.select: SELECT U1.USER_NO, U1.USER_NAME, U1.USER_AGE, U2.USER_PHONE, U2.USER_EMAIL FROM USER_TABLE U1 JOIN USER_INFO U2 ON (U1.USER_NO = U2.USER_NO) ORDER BY U1.USER_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_TABLE VALUES (NVL((SELECT max(USER_NO)+1 FROM USER_TABLE),1),#{name},#{age})
INSERT INTO USER_INFO VALUES (NVL((SELECT max(USER_NO)+1 FROM USER_INFO),1),#{phone},#{email})
